text: Music Box is a 1989 American drama movie directed by Costa-Gavras and starring Jessica Lange (in her Oscar nominated role), Armin Mueller-Stahl, Frederic Forrest, Donald Moffat, Lukas Haas, Mari Törőcsik. It was distributed by TriStar Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1989 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Holocaust movies Category:Movies set in Hungary Category:Movies directed by Costa-Gavras
title: Music Box (movie)
